name: NOLA Cajun Fiesta Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Cheer on the home team with our flavor-packed New Orleans Cajun Fiesta Dip. Pre-game prep includes layering McCormick® Guacamole Seasoning Mix and Zatarain's® Red Beans and Rice Mix with shredded Cheddar cheese, avocados and spicy pork sausage. It's a true celebration of Cajun flavors and exactly the dip you need for a game day win.
ingredients: 2 medium avocados - peeled, pitted and chopped
1 (1 ounce) package McCormick® Guacamole Seasoning Mix
1 (8 ounce) package ZATARAIN'S® Red Beans and Rice Mix
1 pound cooked spicy ground pork sausage
directions: Mix avocados, Seasoning Mix, tomato and lime juice in medium bowl
Meanwhile, prepare Rice Mix as directed on package
Spread 1/2 of the rice mixture in 11x7-inch baking dish
Layer with 1/2 each of the crumbled cooked sausage and cheese
